description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The Black Edition of GraphSpacer includes the classic fast paced gameplay of GraphSpacer with updated HD graphics and effects along with an out of control soundtrack to battle to.
description.short: The Black Edition of GraphSpacer includes the classic fast paced gameplay of GraphSpacer with updated HD graphics and effects along with an out of control soundtrack to battle to.
